summary: Building a website for a trust/charitable organization
architectural_notes: Website project for a trust/charitable organization

existing_features.title: Create a homepage with a hero section introducing the trust, its mission statement, and key highlights
Add an About Us page describing the trust's history, vision, values, and leadership team
Create a Programs/Activities page showcasing the trust's initiatives and ongoing projects
Add a Contact Us page with contact information including address, phone, email, and a contact form
Implement a navigation menu with links to all main pages (Home, About, Programs, Contact)
Add a footer with trust information, quick links, and social media placeholders

Apply a professional, trustworthy visual design theme with warm, compassionate colors (earth tones, greens, or warm neutrals), clear typography optimized for readability, and a clean layout that conveys credibility and social responsibility
Render generated trust website images as static assets in frontend/public/assets/generated
Add the Manavdeep Seva Trust logo (uploaded as LOGO.jpeg) to the website navigation header, replacing or complementing the current text-based branding
Store the uploaded logo as a static asset in frontend/public/assets/generated with an appropriate filename
Add founder information section to the About page displaying 'Founder: Anjani Dwivedi (Kavya)' with contact number '9651044109'
Update the Contact page to include founder contact information showing 'Anjani Dwivedi (Kavya) - 9651044109' in the contact details section

Create a new Donations page with a hero section explaining the importance of donations, donation options (one-time, monthly, custom amounts), and payment information including bank details and UPI details for accepting donations
Create a new Gallery page with tabbed or sectioned layout showing both photo gallery and video gallery, with grid layouts for displaying images and embedded video content
Update the Navigation component to include links to the new Donations and Gallery pages in the main menu
Update the Footer component to include quick links to the Donations and Gallery pages
Update App.tsx router configuration to register routes for the new Donations page and Gallery page
Render generated gallery images as static assets in frontend/public/assets/generated for use in the photo gallery section
Update the Contact page to display the complete office address 'DEORIA, UTTAR PRADESH' in the contact details section
Update the Contact page to display phone number '9651044109' in the contact details section
Update the Contact page to display email address 'manavdeepsevatrust@gmail.com' in the contact details section
Update the Footer component to display the office address 'DEORIA, UTTAR PRADESH', phone '9651044109', and email 'manavdeepsevatrust@gmail.com' in the trust information section
Remove the Leadership Team section from the About page (frontend/src/pages/About.tsx)
Remove all placeholder photos from the Gallery page photo gallery section (frontend/src/pages/Gallery.tsx)
Remove all placeholder videos from the Gallery page video gallery section (frontend/src/pages/Gallery.tsx)

new_feature_requests.summary: Create trust website with basic pages and information
Add founder information: Anjani Dwivedi (Kavya) with contact 9651044109
Add donation section to the website
Add photo and video gallery to the website
Add office address (Deoria, Uttar Pradesh), phone (9651044109), and email (manavdeepsevatrust@gmail.com) to contact information
Remove Leadership Team section from About page
